title: Cynthia Larive - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1992, she was awarded a Ph.D. ... as a professor in the chemistry department at the University of Kansas, and later joined the faculty of the University of California, Riverside, in 2005....

title: Provost Cynthia K. Larive | Inside UCR
snippet: UC Riverside on Facebook UC Riverside on X UC Riverside on YouTube UC Riverside on Instagram UC Riverside on LinkedIn · When Cynthia K. Larive joined UC Riverside as a bioanalytical chemistry professor in 2005, she had no aspirations of an administrative role.

title: Cynthia Larive to become 11th chancellor of UC Santa Cruz - News
snippet: Cynthia K. Larive as the eleventh chancellor of UC Santa Cruz. Currently the provost and executive vice chancellor at UC Riverside, Larive has served the UC community for nearly a decade and a half as a faculty member, administrator ...

title: About Cynthia Larive – Office of the Chancellor
snippet: Larive vino a la UC Santa Cruz procedente de la UC Riverside, donde ella fue preboste y vicerrectora ejecutiva. Como preboste, ella estaba a cargo de la empresa académica, administrando iniciativas de gran escala así como las operaciones académicas al campus de Riverside.
